title: Dread beat and blood
creator_credit: Franco Rosso and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: A unique combination of poetry, music, and politics is portrayed in this film about black reggae musician Lindsay Kwesi Johnson. The lifestyle of blacks in Britain is shown and the pressures they live under. Johnson is seen giving poetry readings in the recording studio as a black activist.
